definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Some plastic parts of Coaster medium-size passenger car are made of china in our company in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 2007年，柯斯达客车部份塑料件在我公司国产化。

sentences.english: Realizing process qualification assessment has important meaning to the domestic of nuclear island equipment.
sentences.chinese: 深入了解工艺评定对核岛主设备国产化具有重要意义。

sentences.english: The key of developing Chinese-made inclinometer systems lies in the substitution of the inclinometers and conversion modules.
sentences.chinese: 测斜仪系统国产化关键是倾斜计和转换模块的替代。

sentences.english: The TCN system of localized metro vehicle in Beijing is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了国产化北京地铁列车控制及网络系统。

sentences.english: Since the drum gear coupling is heavy and has higher added values, it is necessary to localize the manufacture.
sentences.chinese: 鼓形齿接轴重量大，附加值高，国产化生产十分必要。

sentences.english: The process and advanced control system in home-made grain chiller are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了国产化谷物冷却机流程及自动控制系统。

sentences.english: The feasibilities of small-radius pipe-bender made in china are demonstrated in technique.
sentences.chinese: 对小半径弯管国产化的可行性，作了技术论证。

sentences.english: Similar products in the walk in the forefront of high-end domestic floor.
sentences.chinese: 同类产品中走在了高档地板国产化的前列。

sentences.english: Through research and test, the self-reliance manufacturing for the core barrel of pressure water reactor internals has been realized.
sentences.chinese: 通过攻关试验，实现了压水堆吊篮筒体国产化。

sentences.english: This is a fan of electric field and wind made the urgent need to resolve the issue of design.
sentences.chinese: 这是风机国产化和风电场设计亟须解决的问题。

sentences.english: Some plastic parts of Coaster medium-size passenger car are localized in our company in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 2007年，柯斯达客车部份塑料件在我公司国产化。

sentences.english: Safety evaluation on large-scale oil extraction plant engineering;
sentences.chinese: 为国产化大型浸出油厂提高综合效益提供参考。

sentences.english: Continuously improve and analysis Localization work.
sentences.chinese: 持续改善并分析国产化工作。

definition: to transition to a new dynasty or regime/to replace an older product with an upgraded, new-generation one
to put into production/to put into operation
to put sth on the market
to import/imported/entrance/inlet (for the intake of air, water etc)
